{"step_by_step_thinking": "The station of the fetal head is a measure of how far the head has descended into the pelvis. In this case, the +1 station indicates that the fetal head is 1 cm below the ischial spine. The ischial spine is an important landmark in obstetrics, as it is used as a reference point for measuring the descent of the fetal head.
